name: BatteryCellMetadata
description: A description of battery cell metadata

properties.name: state_of_health
properties.description: battery state of health (measured capacity / capacity at beginning of life) at which the rating was performed.

properties.name: specified_capacity
properties.description: specified electric charge capacity of the battery, in ampere-hours (Ah)

properties.name: specified_discharging_voltage
properties.description: specified discharge voltage of the battery, in volt (V)

properties.name: specified_charging_voltage
properties.description: specified discharge voltage of the battery, in volt (V)

properties.name: maximum_charging_current
properties.description: specified discharge voltage of the battery, in volt (V)

properties.name: maximum_discharging_current
properties.description: specified discharge voltage of the battery, in volt (V)

properties.name: discharging_cutoff_voltage
properties.description: specified discharge voltage of the battery, in volt (V)

properties.name: cell_mass
properties.description: Mass of the battery cell, in kilograms (kg).

properties.name: cell_volume
properties.description: Volume of the battery cell, in litre (L).

properties.name: specified_energy_density
properties.description: specified discharge energy density of the battery, in watt-hours per litre (Wh/L)

properties.name: specified_specific_energy
properties.description: specified discharge specific energy of the battery, in watt-hours per kilogram (Wh/kg)
